channel.title: Client wont download or unzip file
channel.description:
Hey guys im trying to figure out what the heck is going wrong rightnow,
so i get this when i run the client,
[code]java.io.FileNotFoundException: C:\Documents and Settings\User\.falador_v2\Maps\m apConfig.txt (The system cannot find the path specified) at java.io.FileInputStream.open(Native Method) at java.io.FileInputStream.<init>(Unknown Source) at java.io.FileInputStream.<init>(Unknown Source) at java.io.FileReader.<init>(Unknown Source) at client.setNewMaps(client.java:180) at client.startUp(client.java:7768) at RSApplet.run(RSApplet.java:33) at client.run(client.java:5009) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source)[/code]
I tried to change the download in cachedownloader and the file name in signlink but still no cigar!
Anyone want to give me any advice? I have Teamviewer also if you think that will help me any better.
-Thanks

Hey guys im trying to figure out what the heck is going wrong rightnow,
